formatted_address: 54 Sembawang Rd, #01-01 Hong Heng Mansion, Singapore 779085
name: Famous Hangout Alfresco Bar (Pet Friendly)

reviews.text: Very nice environment with lots of landscaping & the sound of their water features are a calming & soothing factor.. lastly, service is definitely a thumbs up too.. Highly recommended for a chill time..

Love the family like bistro and restaurany here. The Famous kitchen is just beside Hangout bistro under the same management. The owner boss here are very welcoming, friendly and helpful. Most diners and drinker here are the regular customers like a big family. They have many choices of bottle craft beer or you may just have their draft Stella or Black Cab stout (these two are the one for happy hour until 8pm). They serve wines and hard liquor too. Love the vibe and people here. Food from Famous kitchen are very good too, love the roast duck go with beerüòò. Will be back to try their other dishes. Usually the restaurant and bistro will be full on weekend. Book a table to avoid disappointment. Let them know you prefer to have a seat at the bistro or restaurant.
Amazing mala! Perfect balance of spice and numbness, with fresh ingredients and great customization options. Easily the best mala I‚Äôve had will come back again!

Alfresco bistro linked to Famous Kitchen. They has extensive food menu and very high quality cooking, won Michelin star ‚≠êÔ∏è previously. Must try the cold cockles, dip in generous portions of chili paste. Fried pork in beancurd paste is also very savoury, pair with lots of fried garlics. They also have a lot of live seafood for selection, tried their crab ü¶Ä for few times, always fresh and juicy meat. Special thanks to Lorraine for the great service üëç

Pros
- Food taste good
- Nice ambiance for get together and night out drinking with friends
- Friendly people and service is fast
- Food are reasonably priced
Cons:
- Portion smaller than the menu pictures

Overall:
Very good place for family/friends gathering
